task.title: Creating an Event Category
task.abstract: Organizing events into categories gives Admins the ability to efficiently plan, implement, and manage their events. Event Categories are effectively used as a staging area for future events; event components, such as ticket types, schedule items, venues, etc., that are created directly from the Event Category record will be available for reuse when planning future events. All events must have an Event Category; the system automatically creates an Event Category of "Uncategorized." For recurring events, Admins must create all event objects directly from the Event Category record.

step.cmd: Select the Event Categories tab within the Events app and click the New button.

step.info: For example, an Event Category Name of Alumni Foundation Simple Events is used as the template for all recurring simple events related to the Alumni Foundation.

step.cmd: Identify the Business Group using the lookup.
Select the event's Registration Style using the picklist:
step.info: Simple Events do not support schedule items or sponsor packages.

step.cmd: Enter a value for the Capacity field.
Enable the Ticketing & Registration features that are available for events within this Event Category.
step.info: All events must have at least one associated ticket type. Check the Enable Waitlisting checkbox if there are multiple ticket types for the event, so if all ticket types are sold out, unauthenticated and authenticated users can join a waitlist for the event.

step.cmd: Enter the Organizer Name and Registration Instructions. Click Save.
step.info: The Organizer Name and Registration Instructions display on the Event Detail page in the Community Portal and must be updated for any new events associated with the Event Category. The Description field is used to provide staff users with further information on the Event Category.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Site Event Category related list and click the New Site Event Category button. Select the associated Site using the lookup and click Save.
step.info: The Site Event Category must be linked to the Site record in order for the event to display in the Community Portal.

taskbody.result: The Event Category is created and will allow Admins to store event components on the record for future use.
